org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup

Class IntegrationTestRSGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup.TestRSGroupsBase
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup.IntegrationTestRSGroup

  • public class IntegrationTestRSGroup
extends TestRSGroupsBase
    Runs all of the units tests defined in TestGroupBase as an integration test. Requires TestRSGroupBase.NUM_SLAVE_BASE servers to run.
